help.commands: set file_path,generate,test,set protocols,Cert File Path,Cert File Name,Subject Name,Key Length,Protocol List,Protocols
help.cmd_set.file_path: Set's the path to the certification file
help.cmd_generate: Generate a certificate file using makecert. Subject Name and Key length is optional default values are: ah101, 2048
help.cmd_set.protocols: Set the ssl protocols to be used by authentication
help.cmd_exit: Leave SSL Certification Manager Interactive Mode

p_Cert.File.Path.values: Any valid existing file path with extension (can be relative)

help.p_Cert.File.Path: Defines an existing path to a certificate

p_Cert.File.Name.values: Any valid file name with extension (can be relative)

help.p_Cert.File.Name: Defines a new file name for certificate generation. Extension is: .cer

p_Subject.Name.values: Any valid string value without spaces

help.p_Subject.Name: Defines a subject name for the new certification Default: ah101
help.p_Key.Length: Defines the length of the encryption key Default: 2048
help.p_Protocol.List: Defines a list of Protocols. For more help type: help param Protocols -to get the valid protocol names
help.p_Protocols: Defines a protocol used for ssl. The default protocol is sslv3 + tlsv1
